9 class FilePath:
10 
11  def __init__(self, dao):
12  self.__dao = dao
13 
14  def exists(self, name):
15  query = 'SELECT id FROM file_path WHERE name = :name'
16  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'name': name}).fetchone()
17  if result is None:
18  return False, None
19  else:
20  return True, result['id']
21 
22  def get_all_by_type(self, file_type):
23  query = 'SELECT id, type, name, date, path FROM file_path WHERE type = :type'
24  result = self.__dao.execute(query, {'type': file_type}).fetchall()
25  return [dict(r) for r in result]
26 
27  def add_file_path(self, file_type, name, path):
28  file_path_exists, file_path_id = self.exists(name)
29 
30  params = {
31  'type': file_type,
32  'name': name,
33  'date': str(date.today()),
34  'path': path,
35  }
36 
37  if file_path_exists:
38  query = 'UPDATE file_path SET type = :type, name = :name, date = :date, path = :path WHERE name = :name'
39  else:
40  query = 'INSERT INTO file_path VALUES (:id, :type, :name, :date, :path)'
41  params['id'] = str(uuid.uuid4())
42 
43  self.__dao.execute(query, params)
44  return self.__dao.last_row_id
45 
46  def rm_file_path(self, file_id):
47  query = 'DELETE FROM file_path WHERE id = :id'
48  params = {'id': file_id}
49  self.__dao.execute(query, params)
